text: The Treaty of Berlin (1921) was between the United States and Germany. The US did not agree with parts of the 1919 Treaty of Versailles and wanted to sign a different treaty. == Other websites == *Text of the Treaty Category:1921 in Europe Category:1921 in the United States Category:1920s in Germany Berlin 1921 Category:20th century in Berlin
title: Treaty of Berlin (1921)
